recreational_reservations_requests.name: TENNIS
recreational_reservations_requests.description: The Institute has reserved blocks of court time at The Ritz-Carlton. These reserved courts will be available for open play by individuals attending our Winter Meeting. Please indicate below the times at number of courts available.
recreational_reservations_requests.date: Please complete this form and return it not later than February 1, 1987, to: Donna Hilderley, The Tobacco Institute, 1875 I Street, N.W., Washington, DC 20006.
